title: Firefox 98 rolling out with new customization features for Android and iOS
content:
Firefox is one of the few web browsers left with a non-Chromium rendering engine engine, giving Mozilla the ability to try out new web features and low-level performance changes in a way that would be impractical or difficult to maintain for Chromium-based web browsers. Firefox 98 is now rolling out on desktop and mobile platforms,

The post Firefox 98 rolling out with new customization features for Android and iOS appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Firefox 98 is now rolling out on all platforms, which includes new customization features on Android and download changes on desktop.
